problem_names:
lemmas F_axioms = F_preserves_arrows F_preserves_objects F_preserves_dom 
  F_preserves_cod F_preserves_id F_preserves_comp
lemmas func_pred_defs = preserves_dom_def preserves_cod_def preserves_id_def preserves_comp_def

lemma functors_preserve_arrows [intro]:
  assumes "Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB"
    and "f \<in> ar AA"
  shows "F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> ar BB"

lemma (in "functor") functors_preserve_homsets:
  assumes 1: "A \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub>"
  and 2: "B \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub>"
  and 3: "f \<in> Hom\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> A B"
  shows "F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> (F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A) (F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B)"

lemma functors_preserve_objects [intro]:
  assumes "Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB"
    and "A \<in> ob AA"
  shows "F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A \<in> ob BB"

lemma (in one_cat) id_func_preserves_arrows:
  shows "(id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> : Ar \<rightarrow> Ar"

lemma (in one_cat) id_func_preserves_objects:
  shows "(id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> : Ob \<rightarrow> Ob"

theorem (in one_cat) id_func_functor:
  "Functor (id_func AA) : AA \<longrightarrow> AA"
translations:
lemmas F_axioms = F_preserves_arrows F_preserves_objects F_preserves_dom 
  F_preserves_cod F_preserves_id F_preserves_comp
lemmas func_pred_defs = preserves_dom_def preserves_cod_def preserves_id_def preserves_comp_def
end
text \<open>This gives us nicer notation for asserting that things are functors.\<close>

abbreviation
  Functor  ("Functor _ : _ \<longrightarrow> _" [81]) where
  "Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB \<equiv> functor AA BB F"
subsection \<open>Simple Lemmas\<close>
text \<open>For example:\<close>
lemma (in "functor") "Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB

lemma functors_preserve_arrows [intro]:
  assumes "Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB"
    and "f \<in> ar AA"
  shows "F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> ar BB"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
from \<open>Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB
have "F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> : ar AA \<rightarrow> ar BB"

proof (prove)
using this:
  Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub>
    \<in> Ar\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> \<rightarrow> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
by (simp add: functor_def functor_axioms_def)

proof (state)
this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub>
  \<in> Ar\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> \<rightarrow> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
from this and \<open>f \<in> ar AA\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub>
  \<in> Ar\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> \<rightarrow> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
  f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>AA\<^esub>
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub>
  \<in> Ar\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> \<rightarrow> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
  f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>AA\<^esub>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
by (rule funcset_mem)

proof (state)
this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma (in "functor") functors_preserve_homsets:
  assumes 1: "A \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub>"
  and 2: "B \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub>"
  and 3: "f \<in> Hom\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> A B"
  shows "F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> (F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A) (F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
from 3

proof (chain)
picking this:
  f \<in> Hom A B
have 4: "f \<in> Ar"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> Hom A B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f \<in> Ar
by (simp add: hom_def)

proof (state)
this:
  f \<in> Ar

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
with F_preserves_arrows

proof (chain)
picking this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> \<in> Ar \<rightarrow> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
  f \<in> Ar
have 5: "F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> \<in> Ar \<rightarrow> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
  f \<in> Ar

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
by (rule funcset_mem)

proof (state)
this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
from 4 and F_preserves_dom

proof (chain)
picking this:
  f \<in> Ar
  preserves_dom F
have "Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> (F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f) = F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> f)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> Ar
  preserves_dom F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f =
    F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f)
by (simp add: preserves_dom_def)

proof (state)
this:
  Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f =
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
also

proof (state)
this:
  Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f =
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
from 3

proof (chain)
picking this:
  f \<in> Hom A B
have "\<dots> = F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> Hom A B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
by (simp add: hom_def)

proof (state)
this:
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
have 6: "Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> (F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f) = F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A"

proof (prove)
using this:
  Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f =
    F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A

proof (state)
this:
  Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
from 4 and F_preserves_cod

proof (chain)
picking this:
  f \<in> Ar
  preserves_cod F
have "Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> (F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f) = F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> f)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> Ar
  preserves_cod F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f =
    F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f)
by (simp add: preserves_cod_def)

proof (state)
this:
  Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f =
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
also

proof (state)
this:
  Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f =
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
from 3

proof (chain)
picking this:
  f \<in> Hom A B
have "\<dots> = F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> Hom A B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f) = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
by (simp add: hom_def)

proof (state)
this:
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f) = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
have 7: "Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> (F\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f) = F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B"

proof (prove)
using this:
  Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f =
    F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B

proof (state)
this:
  Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
from 5 and 6 and 7

proof (chain)
picking this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
  Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
  Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<in> Ar\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
  Dom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
  Cod\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
    \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                                 A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B
by (simp add: hom_def)

proof (state)
this:
  F \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
  \<in> Hom\<^bsub>BB\<^esub> F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                               A F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> B

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma functors_preserve_objects [intro]:
  assumes "Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB"
    and "A \<in> ob AA"
  shows "F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A \<in> ob BB"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A \<in> Ob\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A \<in> Ob\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
from \<open>Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB
have "F\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> : ob AA \<rightarrow> ob BB"

proof (prove)
using this:
  Functor F : AA \<longrightarrow> BB

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
    \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> \<rightarrow> Ob\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
by (simp add: functor_def functor_axioms_def)

proof (state)
this:
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
  \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> \<rightarrow> Ob\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A \<in> Ob\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
from this and \<open>A \<in> ob AA\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
  \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> \<rightarrow> Ob\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
  A \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub>
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
  \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub> \<rightarrow> Ob\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
  A \<in> Ob\<^bsub>AA\<^esub>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A \<in> Ob\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>
by (rule funcset_mem)

proof (state)
this:
  F \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A \<in> Ob\<^bsub>BB\<^esub>

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
subsection \<open>Identity Functor\<close>

definition
  id_func :: "('o,'a,'m) category_scheme \<Rightarrow> ('o,'a,'o,'a) functor" where
  "id_func CC = \<lparr>om=(\<lambda>A\<in>ob CC. A), am=(\<lambda>f\<in>ar CC. f)\<rparr>"

locale one_cat = two_cats +
  assumes endo: "BB = AA"

lemma (in one_cat) id_func_preserves_arrows:
  shows "(id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> : Ar \<rightarrow> Ar"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> \<in> Ar \<rightarrow> Ar
by (unfold id_func_def, rule funcsetI, simp)

lemma (in one_cat) id_func_preserves_objects:
  shows "(id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> : Ob \<rightarrow> Ob"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> \<in> Ob \<rightarrow> Ob
by (unfold id_func_def, rule funcsetI, simp)

lemma (in one_cat) id_func_preserves_dom:
  shows  "preserves_dom (id_func AA)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. preserves_dom (id_func AA)
unfolding preserves_dom_def endo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>f\<in>Ar.
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) =
       Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) =
       Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
fix f

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) =
       Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
assume f: "f \<in> Ar"

proof (state)
this:
  f \<in> Ar

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) =
       Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
hence lhs: "(id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) = Dom f"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> Ar

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) = Dom f
by (simp add: id_func_def) auto

proof (state)
this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) = Dom f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) =
       Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
have "(id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = f
using f

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> Ar

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = f
by (simp add: id_func_def)

proof (state)
this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) =
       Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
hence rhs: "Dom (id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = Dom f"

proof (prove)
using this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = Dom f
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = Dom f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) =
       Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
from lhs and rhs

proof (chain)
picking this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) = Dom f
  Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = Dom f
show "(id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) = Dom (id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f"

proof (prove)
using this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) = Dom f
  Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f = Dom f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) =
    Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Dom f) =
  Dom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma (in one_cat) id_func_preserves_cod:
  "preserves_cod (id_func AA)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. preserves_cod (id_func AA)
apply (unfold preserves_cod_def, simp only: endo)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>f\<in>Ar.
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f) =
       Cod id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f) =
       Cod id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
fix f

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f) =
       Cod id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
assume f: "f \<in> Ar"

proof (state)
this:
  f \<in> Ar

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>
       id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f) =
       Cod id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
hence lhs: "(id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f) = Cod f"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> Ar

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f) = Cod f
by (simp add: id_func_def) auto

proof (state)
this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> (Cod f) = Cod f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       f \<in> Ar \<Longrightarrow>

  "Functor (id_func AA) : AA \<longrightarrow> AA"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):

proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):

from id_func_preserves_arrows
    and id_func_preserves_objects
    and id_func_preserves_dom
    and id_func_preserves_cod
    and id_func_preserves_id
    and id_func_preserves_comp

picking this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> \<in> Ar \<rightarrow> Ar
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> \<in> Ob \<rightarrow> Ob
  preserves_dom (id_func AA)
  preserves_cod (id_func AA)
  preserves_id (id_func AA)
  preserves_comp (id_func AA)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> \<in> Ar \<rightarrow> Ar
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> \<in> Ob \<rightarrow> Ob
  preserves_dom (id_func AA)
  preserves_cod (id_func AA)
  preserves_id (id_func AA)
  preserves_comp (id_func AA)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA

by unfold_locales (simp_all add: endo preserves_dom_def
      preserves_cod_def preserves_id_def preserves_comp_def)

this:
  Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
